text: Umphrofethi usondele kakhulu kwabakholwayo ngaphezu kwabo uqobo. Futhi amakhosikazi akhe angonina (babakholwayo) futhi izihlobo ngobudlelwano zisondelene ezinye zazo kwezinye ngokwesimemezelo sikaMvelinqangi kunabakholwayo nabafuduki ngaphandle kokuba uma nenze okuhle ebanganeni benu, lokhu kubhaliwe encwadini
